original_text: Whatever we do, we do it because Christ loves us. We know that one man, Christ, died on behalf of all people. So we also know that all of us died with him.
korean_text: 그리스도의 사랑이 우리를 강권하시는도다 우리가 생각하건대 한 사람이 모든 사람을 대신하여 죽었은즉 모든 사람이 죽은 것이라

sentences.original_text: we do it because Christ loves us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도가 우리를 사랑하므로 우리는 그것을 합니다

sentences.original_text: We know that one man, Christ
died on behalf of all people
that all of us died with him
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 모두가 그와 함께 죽었다는 것을
